citations.narrative:
***The facility is open to the public and is currently exhibiting a camel, goats, chickens, cattle, llama and other farm
animals. A USDA license is required to exhibit the camel but all other regulated animals will be covered by your license
once obtained. Records show the facility had applied for licensing in May 2024 but a pre-license inspection has not been
scheduled. Please contact me as soon as you are ready to be begin the licensing process.
No regulated activity may be conducted until a valid USDA license is obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.
n

narrative:
2.1 
   
Requirements and application 
***The facility is open to the public and is currently exhibiting a camel, goats, chickens, cattle, llama and other farm 
animals. A USDA license is required to exhibit the camel but all other regulated animals will be covered by your license 
once obtained. Records show the facility had applied for licensing in May 2024 but a pre-license inspection has not been 
scheduled. Please contact me as soon as you are ready to be begin the licensing process.  
 
No regulated activity may be conducted until a valid USDA license is obtained. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant. 
 
 n
